mapper.select: SELECT email AS email ,name AS name ,phone_number AS phoneNumber ,phone_number_yn AS phoneNumberYn FROM adgomin_user WHERE 1=1 AND user_order = #{userOrder}
SELECT T2.user_order AS userOrder FROM adgomin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T2 ON T1.email = T2.email WHERE 1=1 AND media_order = #{mediaOrder}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adgomin_payments (order_id, buyer_order, seller_order, media_order, total_amount, create_dt, modify_dt) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{buyerOrder}, #{sellerOrder}, #{mediaOrder}, #{totalAmount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT total_amount AS totalAmount FROM adgomin_payments WHERE 1=1 AND order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adgomin_payment_failed (buyer_order, seller_order, media_order, total_amount, payment_amount, payment_failed_reason, create_dt, modify_dt) VALUES (#{buyerOrder}, #{sellerOrder}, #{mediaOrder}, #{totalAmount}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentFailedReason}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO adgomin_payments (order_id, buyer_order, seller_order, media_order, total_amount, payment_amount, create_dt, modify_dt, tid, signature, status, paid_at, pay_method, goods_name, approve_no, buyer_name, buyer_tel, buyer_email, receipt_url) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{buyerOrder}, #{sellerOrder}, #{mediaOrder}, #{totalAmount}, #{paymentAmount}, NOW(), NOW(), #{tid}, #{signature}, #{status}, #{paidAt}, #{payMethod}, #{goodsName}, #{approveNo}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerEmail}, #{receiptUrl})

INSERT INTO adgomin_payments_card (payment_order, card_code, card_name, card_num, card_quota, card_type, can_part_cancel, acqu_card_code, acqu_card_name) VALUES (#{paymentOrder}, #{cardCode}, #{cardName}, #{cardNum}, #{cardQuota}, #{cardType}, #{canPartCancel}, #{acquCardCode}, #{acquCardName})
